name: Baba-BAH
description:
a game made for Global gamjam 2016!

It looks like a gameboy game, music is made on an actual gamboy!

you might have to play it a few times to figure it out but I'll do my best to explain it.

Snail game - left and right arrow

cloaked poser game - simon says game, after he does 4 moves press the arrowkeys in the same order as him.

don't kill the cat - don't do it!

Stick game - stop the stick on when it's in the smaller bar thingy....

bongo game - press the button that is on the screen

avoid the spikes - move the dude so he is where the spikes aren't

pray game - press keys (any keys) FAST!
